name: All-Star Fielding Challenge VR
description: All-Star Fielding Challenge VR is an exciting baseball fielding simulator that puts you at shortstop as you attempt to field line-drives, pop-ups, and ground balls.  Catch enough balls to progress through each round and achieve greatness as you climb the leaderboard.  Casual to hardcore baseball fans will enjoy this fast-paced arcade style baseball action of All-Star Fielding Challenge VR.
